content.prompt: The conflict alluded to in the passage is best explained by

choices.label: the spread of Marxist ideology during the late nineteenth and early twentieth centuries
protest and insurrection among the populations of France and Germany
territorial disputes and rival alliance structures involving the two countries
the collapse of European empires as anticolonial movements developed in the early twentieth century

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
